entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is mentioned as one of the students who accompanied Professor to the castle. He is described as being led up the steps into the castle by Professor.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is mentioned as one of the students who accompanied Professor to the castle. He is described as being led up the steps into the castle by Professor.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as one of the students who joined the crowd swarming up the steps with Ron and Harry. She prodded Ron in the back to make him hurry.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of the students who joined the crowd swarming up the steps with Hermione and Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as one of the students who joined the crowd swarming up the steps with Ron and Hermione. He followed the crowd toward the Great Hall.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as a Transfiguration teacher and head of Gryffindor House. She called out to Harry and Hermione over the heads of the crowd.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall called out to Harry over the heads of the crowd.
Professor McGonagall called out to Hermione over the heads of the crowd.
